text: Paul Vincent Guilfoyle (; born April 28, 1949) is an American actor. He is known for his role in the CBS police drama CSI: Crime Scene Investigation as Captain Jim Brass from 2000 to 2014. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Boston
title: Paul Guilfoyle
